instructions: From the home screen, tap Apps > Settings . If using Tab view, select the General tab. Tap About phone > Software info . Review the software version details .
Tap Install and restart . Wait as your device updated to software version H81120x.

Verify the device is connected to Wi-Fi. From the home screen, tap Apps > Settings . If using Tab view, select the General tab. Tap About phone > Update Center > System update > Check for update . Follow the on-screen prompts to update the device.
